api_list.api_description: Convert an amount from a base currency to a target currency using real-time conversion rates.

optional_parameters.name: base_currency
optional_parameters.description: The currency code of the base currency.

optional_parameters.name: amount
optional_parameters.description: The amount in base currency to convert.

optional_parameters.name: target_currency
optional_parameters.description: The currency code to convert the base currency to.

api_list.api_description: Search for a ZIP code based on the address details.

required_parameters.name: city
required_parameters.description: Name of the city. Must have at least 3 characters.

required_parameters.name: street
required_parameters.description: Name of the street. Must have at least 3 characters.

optional_parameters.name: return_format
optional_parameters.description: Format of the return data (json or xml).

query: I'd like to convert 100 USD to BRL. Also, can you find the ZIP code for a street in Rio de Janeiro, Brazil?
